Why in the world did he attack you?"
"I escaped from the Holy City Pallant to the east.
But bandits have infested this road, preying on
travellers like me just trying to make it to safety…"
"To think that the people who are fleeing from the demon's
evil turn to evil themselves… What horrible times."
"Our Lord should exterminate these thieves, but…
Sure, he has his hands full with the demon invasion, but
the tides of war will never turn unless he fixes the supply
problem. That starts with getting rid of bandits on the roads."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】真面目.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0

"Now, I'm on my way to see my children in the west.
I wanna divide up my land among them and ask them
to care for the fields. I can live in peace with all my
grandchildren. But… is living in peace really possible now…?"
"…Ohh, darn it. I need to make tracks if I'm gonna
make it to the next town before sundown. It ain't much,
but here. Take this and use it for travelling expenses."
